artist: Robert Filliou; Karl Gerstner; Daniel Spoeri; Galerie der Spiegel
creditline: Transfer from the MIA Research and Reference Library; The John R. Van Derlip Library Fund, 1969
description: black clamshell box containing 96 grey, black and white cards, printed with an image on one side and text in three languages on back; inner box contains wooden frame to hold cards in two rows of three stacks each
medium: Mixed media multiple consisting of wood, letterpress, and offset lithographs on cardboard and paper, housed in cloth over cardboard box
provenance: All of the multiples were acquired in 1969 by the MIA Research and Reference Library through the John Russell Van Derlip Library Fund.
signed: on inner spine, in black: [R Filliou]
title: Je disais Ã  Marianne (I was Telling Marianne)
